```{r, echo=F, comment=NULL}
tab<-vvv$tab
if(nrow(tab)>1){
  if(sum(grepl(names(tab), pattern = "TEAMS"))>0){
    tab<-tab[TEAMS%in%team]
    tab[,c("TEAMS"):=NULL]
    if (sum(grepl(names(tab), pattern = "TEAM MEMBER"))>0){
      tab<-tab[`TEAM MEMBER`%in% line]
      tab[,c("TEAM MEMBER"):=NULL]
    }
  }
  if (nrow(tab)>0){
    flextable(tab)
  }
}
```
